description: Installation of freestanding "keeguard" safety handrail to unprotected roof perimeters with new "cat" ladders to allow replacement/maintenance of HVAC plant and roof membranes. This application may affect the character and appearance of the conservation area.  Town and Country Planning (Listed Building and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 (as amended); section 73.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: Site Plan - EP/NRE/00; Roof plans EXISTING AND PROPOSED - EP/NRE/01 - Revision 01 February 2011, Roof plans EXISTING AND PROPOSED - EP/NRE/02 - Revision 01 February 2011, Elevations - EXISTING AND PROPOSED - EP/NRE/03, Elevations - EXISTING AND PROPOSED - EP/NRE/04, Elevations - EXISTING AND PROPOSED - EP/NRE/05, Elevations - EXISTING AND PROPOSED - EP/NRE/06, Elevations - EXISTING AND PROPOSED - EP/NRE/07, Design and Access Statement - January 2011, Section detail showing weighted foot,  Photo showing example of railings.

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
